narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Athenapsych LLC is a Psychologist provider based in Bronx, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $20.4M in Medicaid payments across 153K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $20.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
